task.title: Calculate Distances and Angles
task.shortdesc: You can calculate the distance between any two points you select. The following information is displayed:

ul.li: The distance between the points, measured in drawing units.
Their angle in the xy plane.
Their angle measured fromthe xy plane.

The change (delta) in the x, y, and z distances between the two points.
To calculate the distance between two points and their angle
Choose Tools > Inquiry > Distance from the main menu.
Specify the first point.
Specify the second point.

context.p: Use the Distance command to calculate the distance (A) between two points (B and C), the angle in the xy plane (D), the angle from the xy plane, and the delta x (E), delta y (F), and delta z distance between the two points.
TIP To use specific points on selected objects, use object snaps to select the precise points on the objects.
